title: #348 A Real Micro
description:
We're here and we're queer as Joe enjoys a very gay movie, Mark shares an old tale from London, and we answer some of your questions. Check it out!

Sponsored by: Blue Chew (bluechew.com code: TUESDAYS) & Sheath Underwear (sheathunderwear.com code: TUESGAYS)

Subscribe to our Patreon for full video of the show, bonus eps, and all of our pre-2017 episodes
www.patreon.com/tuesdays
